states.name: Recv
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Recv" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.
The receiver only sends MAX_STREAM_DATA frames in the "Recv" state.

states.name: Size Known
enter_hints: The receiving part of the stream then enters the "Size Known" state.
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.
